text: Ani amhi tumacya purvihi aneka rasula (paigambara) pathavile aheta, ani amhi tya sarvanna patni ani santana rakhanara banavile hote. Allahacya hukumavina ekhadi nisani anuna dakhavine konatyahi paigambaracya akhatyaratila (avakhyatila) gosta nahi. Pratyeka nirdharita vayadyaca eka grantha ahe
